import React from 'react' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { clearItemFromCart } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem: { name, imageUrl, price, quantity }}) => (
{name} {quantity} ${price}
✕
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ clearItem: clearItemFromCart }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutItem)
